response.overview: Cûdîyê Miradan (Cudi of Wishes), based on the emotion and images of Cudi's birth memory, deals with the natural births of the four seasons in Cudi and the conflicts that do not interfere with this life at the same time. The name of a mountain, which is the home of many kinds of flowers, goats and honey bees, and which is believed to be easily accessible, has been defined in detailed language over the years, this time it is an effort to establish it from within that geography, with the voice of nature.
response.title: Cûdîye Miradan
